snippet.title: Romance of the Three Kingdoms 8 Remake - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
The original game first debuted in Japan back in 2001, followed by a North American release in 2003. Now, Romance of the Three Kingdoms 8 Remake.  is ready to return to action digitally in North America on Nintendo Switch™, PlayStation®5, PlayStation®4, and Steam® in early 2024.

https://www.koeitecmoamerica.com/rtk8-remake/

Romance of the Three Kingdoms 8 Remake is based on Romance of the Three Kingdoms VIII with Power Up Kit, complete with both the “All Officers Play” and “All Periods Scenarios” features. In addition, the game boasts all-new graphical and game system upgrades to help reawaken the title as the newest addition to KOEI TECMO’s long revered franchise.
